article_title: Risk of regional war hangs over Gaza ceasefire talks
sentence: In  Gaza,  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry  -  whose  figures  have  been  used  by  the  UN  and  Israel  in  the  past  -  says  the  number  of  people  killed  in  Israeli  operations  there  since  the  war  began  has  now  passed  40,000.
